tags.name: capsule-progress
tags.description: A progress indicator component that displays the progress of a task or operation.

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: The current progress value (0 to max).

attributes.name: max
attributes.description: The maximum value of the progress (default: 100).

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: The size of the progress bar.

attributes.name: color
attributes.description: The color theme of the progress bar.
